content.raw: FYI: If a program has already been configured to open a specific file type, you can use `win32api.FindExecutable('path_to_a_file_that_exists.h5')` to find the default executable. I would probably still suggest prompting the user to choose \(particularly for text editors\) since this may be their first time using Python and the default/existing program may be a poor choice.
content.html: FYI: If a program has already been configured to open a specific file type, you can use win32api.FindExecutable('path_to_a_file_that_exists.h5') to find the default executable. I would probably still suggest prompting the user to choose (particularly for text editors) since this may be their first time using Python and the default/existing program may be a poor choice.
